com.googlecode.htmlcompressor.compressor

Class HtmlMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.htmlcompressor.compressor.HtmlMetrics

  • public class HtmlMetrics
extends Object
    Class that stores metrics about HTML documents.
    Author:
    Sergiy Kovalchuk
